00097 template <typename T>
00098 T *DzAssertCast(DzBase *base)
00099 {
00100     if ( !base )
00101     {
00102         return (T*)base;
00103     }
00104     T *derived = qobject_cast<T *>(base);
00105     if (!derived)
00106     {
00107         QString message = QString( QObject::tr("Failure to cast DzAssertCast: %1 pointer cannot be cast to %2 pointer") )
00108             .arg(base->metaObject()->className()).arg(T::staticMetaObject.className());
00109         throw message;
00110     }
00111     return derived;
00112 }
00113 #define DZ_ASSERT_CAST( dzBase, className ) DzAssertCast<className>(dzBase)
